context: I like books by Kathleen Grissom. Do you know this author?
I know she authored The Kitchen House and was born in Saskatchewan. Have you read other books by her?
I've read The Kitchen House but I believe there's a squeal which I have not read yet.
Yes, she also wrote Glory Over Everything: Beyond The Kitchen House Did you enjoy this book because it is historical fiction or because it was romance?
I enjoy both genres so I think the book overall was just great.
resp: I think you might also enjoy Wives and Daughters by Pam Morris. Have you heard of this author?
